DOC.criteria: The subject must read , understand , sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT receive fully execute copy form . The subject must less 18 45 year age presbyopic add . The subject must willing able adhere instruction set protocol . The subject must adapt soft contact lens wearer eye . The subject must willing wear study contact lenses 14 hours/day . The subject 's vertex correct spherical equivalent distance refraction must range 1.00 Diopters ( D ) 6.00 D eye . The subject must refractive cylinder less equal 1.00 D eye . The subject must best correct visual acuity 20/30 ( 6/9 ) good eye . The subject must require visual correction eye ( monofit monovision allow ) . The subject must normal eye ( i.e. , ocular medication infection type ) . Current 1DAY ACUVUE® TruEye® wearer Anisometropia 1.00 D great Any Ocular systemic allergy disease might interfere contact lens wear . Any Systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication might interfere contact lens wear . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal staining , abnormality cornea would contraindicate contact lens wear . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) tarsal abnormality bulbar injection might interfere contact lens wear .
